notes: No double discounts: if another offer is applied, points cannot be used
Customer name or email must be provided at time of purchase to earn points

rewards.description: All food and drink items on the menu can be redeemed with points

thresholds.50: Redeem small items (e.g. coffee, soft drink)
thresholds.100: Redeem mid-range items (e.g. beer, cocktails, nachos)
thresholds.500: Redeem multiple items or use for a large order

integration.tracking_method: Manual assignment using customer name or email at purchase
